welcome.title: Welcome to Starlit Journals!
welcome.content:
# Welcome to Starlit Journals!

We're thrilled to have you join our cozy, supportive community. Starlit Journals is your safe space to reflect, express, and growâ€”one entry at a time.

## âœ¨ What you can do here
- **Daily Journaling:** Write about your day, your thoughts, or anything on your mind.
- **Mood Tracking:** Select your mood with each entry and discover your emotional patterns over time.
- **Streak & Writing Rewards:** Earn coins for journaling streaks and writing milestones.
- **Public & Private Entries:** Keep entries private or share them anonymously in the [Public Journals feed](https://starlitjournals.com/public-journals).
- **Weekly Summaries:** Receive a weekly mail with your stats, most frequent mood, and a writing prompt.
- **CozyShop:** Spend your coins on journal themes, stickers, and more to personalize your experience.
- **Profile & Anonymity:** Set an anonymous name, customize your profile, and control your privacy.
- **Feedback & Support:** We're always here to help. Reply to this mail with any questions or suggestions!

## ðŸ›’ The CozyShop
Unlock new journal themes, stickers, and more! Visit the [CozyShop](https://starlitjournals.com/cozyshop) to see what's available. Use your coins to personalize your journaling experience.

## ðŸŒ Public Journals
Share your thoughts with the world or get inspired by others. Make any entry public to appear in the [Public Journals feed](https://starlitjournals.com/public-journals). You can browse, like, and follow other writersâ€”anonymously!

## ðŸ† Rewards & Milestones
Earn coins for your dedication! Here are the current rewards:

**Streak Milestones:**
- 7 days: 60 coins
- 14 days: 80 coins
- 30 days: 150 coins
- 100 days: 300 coins
- 200 days: 450 coins
- 300 days: 600 coins
- 365 days: 1200 coins + special theme

**Entry Milestones:**
- 1 entry: 50 coins
- 5 entries: 60 coins
- 10 entries: 80 coins
- 20 entries: 100 coins
- 30 entries: 120 coins
- 50 entries: 200 coins
- 100 entries: 300 coins
- 200 entries: 450 coins
- 300 entries: 600 coins
- 365 entries: 1200 coins + special badge

## ðŸŽ Your Welcome Gift
We've added **50 coins** to your account as a thank you for joining. Use them in the CozyShop to unlock new themes and items!

## ðŸš€ Getting Started
1. [Start your first journal entry](https://starlitjournals.com/journaling-alt)
2. Explore your dashboard for stats and insights
3. Visit the [CozyShop](https://starlitjournals.com/cozyshop) to see what you can unlock
4. Set up your profile and choose an anonymous name

If you ever need help, just reply to this mail.

Happy journaling!

â€” The Starlit Journals Team

seasonal.title: Happy Valentine's Day!
seasonal.content:
# Happy Valentine's Day! 

:heart: Wishing you a day filled with love and kindness.

> Take a moment to write something for yourself or someone you care about.

feedback.title: Help Us Improve (50 coins reward)
feedback.content:
# We Value Your Feedback!

**It's your 3rd day!** We'd love to hear from you.

[Fill out this quick feedback form](https://tally.so/r/3xoNOo) and help us make Starlit Journals even better.

**As a thank you, you'll receive _50 coins_!** :tada:

reward.title: Your Welcome Gift
reward.content:
# Welcome Gift

**We've added _50 coins_ to your account as a thank you for joining!**

Enjoy journaling and treat yourself in the CozyShop! :sparkles:

7day.title: 7-Day Streak!
7day.content:
# 7-Day Streak!

:tada: **You've journaled for 7 days in a row!**

**Reward:** 60 coins

365day.title: 1 Year Streak!
365day.content:
# 1 Year Streak!

**A year of journaling!**

**Reward:** 1200 coins and a special theme :crown:

1entry.title: First Entry!
1entry.content:
# First Entry!

**You've written your very first journal entry.**

**Reward:** 70 coins :sparkles:

365entries.title: 365 Entries!
365entries.content:
# 365 Entries!

**A year's worth of entries!**

**Reward:** 1200 coins and a special badge :crown:

weeklySummary.title: Your Weekly Summary

positive.title: Keep the Positive Vibes Going!
positive.content:
# It's Great to See You Shining!

We've noticed you've been feeling positive lately. That's wonderful! Keep embracing the good moments and expressing your joy.

> Why not write about what's making you smile today?

Keep up the amazing energy!

â€” The Starlit Journals Team

negative.title: A Gentle Check-In
negative.content:
# Thinking of You

We've noticed you may have been going through a tough time recently. Remember that it's okay to not be okay. Your journal is a safe space to process these feelings.

> Writing can be a powerful tool for navigating difficult emotions. Be kind to yourself.

We're here for you.

â€” The Starlit Journals Team

mixed.title: Embracing the Journey
mixed.content:
# Every Feeling is Valid

Life is a mix of ups and downs, and your journal is here for all of it. We see you're navigating a range of emotions, and that's completely normal.

> Take a moment to reflect on the different feelings you've experienced this week.

Keep writing and reflecting.

â€” The Starlit Journals Team

prompt.title: Writing Prompt
prompt.content:
# Writing Prompt

> Write about a small moment that made you smile recently.

prompt.title: Writing Prompt
prompt.content:
# Writing Prompt

> Describe a place where you feel most at peace.

prompt.title: Writing Prompt
prompt.content:
# Writing Prompt

> What is something you're looking forward to?
